intro: Megacarpaea delavayi f. microphylla, commonly known as the small-leafed giant carpaea, is a rare and unique plant species native to the high altitudes of Yunnan Province in China. The plant typically grows in rocky, well-drained soils and thrives in cool, moist climates.
